short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Natiq is the Text-to-Speech (TTS) technology that converts Arabic text into speech with different natural sounding voices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read  the current selected text at web-page  with one click, using RDI text to speech (TTS) in Arabic.
Read Natiq uses text-to-speech (TTS) technology to convert webpage text to audio.  It works on a variety of websites, including news sites, blogs, fan fiction, publications, textbooks, school and class websites, and online university course materials.
